page.title: 13The Church
page.content:
The vicar does not live at Sampford Arundel. He lives at Rockwell Green. He is the vicar of two other churches, Rockwell Green and Thorne St.Margaret.
{Murder at the church door. A long time ago there was a murder at Sampford church, involving Nicholas Arundel. He was the lord of the manor and was disliked by many of the villagers. Some of them decided to attack the manor house. Nicholas escaped and ran to the church for safety but the vicar would not let him in.When the villagers caught up with him they killed him in front of the church porch. They were put on trial and twenty-five of them were hanged.
